https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bBL33mnR8WYznTEe6DUGA5EpuFq.jpg Workers employed under unacceptable conditions are increasing in Japan after the Japanese government's easing of labor regulations. This shocking documentary follows a truck driver and his fight for a normal life as he is threatened by a gang hired by his employers. A Normal Life Please
